GME (Globales Modell) bụ ihe na-arụ ọrụ n'ụwa niile nke na-arụ n'ọrụ site na Deutscher Wetterdienst, ọrụ ihu igwe nke mba Germany
A na-agba ihe nlereanya ahụ site na iji ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu grid icosahedral-hexagonal
Usoro GME grid point zere ọghọm nke usoro spectral yana nsogbụ pole na latitude longituditude grids ma na-enye usoro data dabara nke ọma màkà ịrụ ọrụ dị elu na kọmputa ndị na-ekesa ebe nchekwa
GME nọchiri ụdị abụọ gara-aga (GM na EM), ma bụrụ nké izizi n'ubochi mbu n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1999.
A ga-eji usoro GME na grid zuru ụwa ọnụ mee ihe site nà Flow-following, finite-volume Icosahedral Model (FIM), ihe nlereanya nnwale na-eme ugbua na United States.
E ji ụdị ICON (Icosahedral Nonhydrostatic) dochie GME n'ubochi irí abụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2015

ICON na-eji otu usoro icosahedral, mànà o nwèrè mkpebi dị elu na kilomita iri na atọ. Ébé nrụọrụ weebụ dị íchè íchè na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na-ekesa data nlereanya ICON, gụnyere Tropical Tidbits na Windy.
